channel.title: 317 luzoxpk bring back pk,pvm eco!
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8uw0c4f.gif[/img%C2%A0%20(add%20a%20]%20after%20img)[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8uw0c4f.gif[/img] [center]Welcome to LUZOXPK Advertising topic![/center] OFFICIAL WEBSITE [url=http://www.luzoxpk.com/]http://www.luzoxpk.com/[/url] FORUMS [url=http://luzoxpk.com/forum/index.php]http://luzoxpk.com/forum/index.php[/url] CLIENT DOWNLOAD [url=http://luzoxpk.com/luzoxpk.jar]http://luzoxpk.com/luzoxpk.jar[/url] What unique things we provide? Lets see... * UPDATES EVERY WEEK! * Pking. * Pvming if you don't want to pk or skill.(Great way making money too) * Skilling if your bored,dont wanna pvm Or Just like skilling <3 * Bank pins.(Keep them banks safe :P) VERY UNIQUE! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/141mgyw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2dhrwg3.png[/img] When logging in....: [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/20a8751.png[/img] * Completionist need all skills 99 to get it and wear it. +12 all stats too :) * Barrows minigame.(barrows sell for 5m piece,good money) * Crystal key chest. (vote reward, and pvm drop) [img]http://gyazo.com/a5f54d7009355e375a6cfac5c27d2493.gif[/img] * Shiny key chest. (pvm drop) Possible loots : Vesta,statius,zuriel,morrigan Etc.etc. [img]http://gyazo.com/b6f7faf3f3b17557702d4120d1a0f862.gif[/img] * Fully functional magic combat. (thanks to MGT MADNESS) * Dicing.(Donate for rank+dicebag) * Boss stages.Won't lose items here :P * Skilling stages. * Some 634/718 Items. (request by players) Torva,chaotics,Handcannon,korasi And many more... look below for Some of em. [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/xgjudg.png[/img] * Killstreaks. * New bank interface * Redskull command, Unable to use prot item(For them risk fights) * Very nice community AT THE MOMENT. (Please dont join if you hate us all) * Custom weapons (Not too op) * And many more Things you want to test =)
Commands (command ingame ::EXTRA) [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2rmtetx.png[/img] ::food (Based on rank you get different food) -Player - Sharks heal 20 -Donator - Manta rays heal 22 -Super Donator + - Rocktails heal 24 (You can buy these from shop too,not noteable but still :P) Daily spin (Best rewards : Armadyl,Bandos,AGS And crystal bow) You can get daily spins from treasure chest Too (Pvm) [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/ipcxno.png[/img] Points tab <3 [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/29dbc47.png[/img] You get 1target point for killing your target in wilderness. [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/11t06xy.png[/img] Working Lootshare in clanchat+ kicking players :P [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/14xz2om.png[/img] NOW SHOPS: Voting gives you 20points and Crystal key(You can vote every 12h) [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/118p2m1.png[/img] Pk point shop, Nothing fancy. We prefer Loots from pvm :P (EP DROPS CAN GIVE PVP ARMORS) [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/sws46w.png[/img] (Sanfew serum restores spec) Kill req. for saving some money :) And ofc. showing off :P [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/27y3cyo.png[/img] PVM POINTS! [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/24myozk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/29o4cv5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/20t5kc2.png[/img] You get 1pvm point (2with ROW) When killing npc :P (YES ALL NPC'S GIVE PVM POINT) Boss teleports : [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/34gq3de.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2na1r0o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/qyxnnt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2hdnpjn.png[/img] JOIN NOW FOR AMAZING SERVER! OFFICIAL WEBSITE [url=http://www.luzoxpk.com/]http://www.luzoxpk.com/[/url] CLIENT DOWNLOAD [url=http://luzoxpk.com/luzoxpk.jar]http://luzoxpk.com/luzoxpk.jar[/url]
MORE INFORMATION COMING SOON!
Credits and help: Mgt Madness:credits for helping me out Foreverpkers source:credits for the base Zivik: helping me Ipkmills: thinking and game updates

item.title: 317 luzoxpk bring back pk,pvm eco!
item.dc:creator: @justus69 justus69
item.description:
@justus69 wrote:


[center]Welcome to LUZOXPK Advertising topic![/center]
OFFICIAL WEBSITE
http://www.luzoxpk.com/
FORUMS http://luzoxpk.com/forum/index.php
CLIENT DOWNLOAD http://luzoxpk.com/luzoxpk.jar
What unique things we provide? Lets see…

  • UPDATES EVERY WEEK!
  • Pking.
  • Pvming if you don’t want to pk or skill.(Great way making money too)
  • Skilling if your bored,dont wanna pvm Or Just like skilling <3
  • Bank pins.(Keep them banks safe :P) VERY UNIQUE!


    When logging in…:
  • Completionist need all skills 99 to get it and wear it. +12 all stats too
  • Barrows minigame.(barrows sell for 5m piece,good money)
  • Crystal key chest. (vote reward, and pvm drop)
  • Shiny key chest. (pvm drop) Possible loots : Vesta,statius,zuriel,morrigan Etc.etc.
  • Fully functional magic combat. (thanks to MGT MADNESS)
  • Dicing.(Donate for rank+dicebag)
  • Boss stages.Won’t lose items here
  • Skilling stages.
  • Some 634/718 Items. (request by players) Torva,chaotics,Handcannon,korasi And many more… look below for Some of em.
  • Killstreaks.
  • New bank interface
  • Redskull command, Unable to use prot item(For them risk fights)
  • Very nice community AT THE MOMENT. (Please dont join if you hate us all)
  • Custom weapons (Not too op)
  • And many more Things you want to test =)

Commands (command ingame ::EXTRA)

::food (Based on rank you get different food)
-Player - Sharks heal 20
-Donator - Manta rays heal 22
-Super Donator + - Rocktails heal 24 (You can buy these from shop too,not noteable but still :P)
Daily spin (Best rewards : Armadyl,Bandos,AGS And crystal bow)
You can get daily spins from treasure chest Too (Pvm)

Points tab <3

You get 1target point for killing your target in wilderness.

Working Lootshare in clanchat+ kicking players

NOW SHOPS:
Voting gives you 20points and Crystal key(You can vote every 12h)

Pk point shop, Nothing fancy. We prefer Loots from pvm (EP DROPS CAN GIVE PVP ARMORS)

(Sanfew serum restores spec)
Kill req. for saving some money And ofc. showing off

PVM POINTS!



You get 1pvm point (2with ROW) When killing npc (YES ALL NPC’S GIVE PVM POINT)
Boss teleports :




JOIN NOW FOR AMAZING SERVER!
OFFICIAL WEBSITE
http://www.luzoxpk.com/
CLIENT DOWNLOAD
http://luzoxpk.com/luzoxpk.jar

MORE INFORMATION COMING SOON!
